org.eclipse.ecf.remoteservice.rest.resource
Interface IRestResource

All Known Implementing Classes:
XMLResource
public interface IRestResource

This interface can be used to register services for the resource representation creation process. A sample implementation can be found on XMLResource for XML.

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object createRepresentation(java.lang.String responseBody)
          Parse a REST response to a given format i.e.
 java.lang.String getIdentifier()
          Returns the identifier of this resource.
 

Method Detail

getIdentifier

java.lang.String getIdentifier()
Returns the identifier of this resource. This is used to check which resource should be used to parse a response from a IRestCall. Therefore the result from IRestCall.getEstimatedResourceIdentifier() will be compared with the result of this method.

Returns:
the identifier for this resource. Cannot be null.

createRepresentation

java.lang.Object createRepresentation(java.lang.String responseBody)
                                      throws java.text.ParseException
Parse a REST response to a given format i.e. XML or JSON. Implementations can be registered with a normal OSGi service.

Parameters:
responseBody - the string representation from the response.
Returns:
the parsed response. Can be null.
Throws:
java.text.ParseException
